name: X Attack
description:
An item that raises the
Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle.
It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defense
description:
An item that raises the
Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle.
It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description:
An item that raises the
Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle.
It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special
description:
An item that raises the
Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle.
It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Defense
description:
An item that raises
the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle.
It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
